channel.title: RuneScape Stats Grabber by Ron
channel.description:
[b]RuneScape Stats Grabber Beta 2 by Ron[/b]
Features: + Grabs all skills flawlessly + Uses Jagex's highscore lite + Calculates Exp to Next Lvl + Form loads in less than a second + Easy to read stats with clCream and clSkyBlue backgrounds + Dynamically loads skills and games to the form + Calculates a skill's level if you only have 1 unranked skill + Saves all usernames and uses a combobox to scroll through them + Delete usernames by clicking on them and hitting the Delete button
[img]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/8199/rsstatsbyronzezimaae6.png[/img]
I rewrote the my entire script. I took a lot of functionality out because no one even used a lot of the features lol. If I ever have time the time, I will add more features. A copy of my To Do list is included in the forward comments.
~Ron :)

item.title: RuneScape Stats Grabber by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

That’s because I discovered the experience formula and decided to calculate the lvls all the way to 200,000,000 ( max number of experience points ). Lvl 126 is around 188 million and lvl 127 is above 200 million. So at 200 million exp, I left it as lvl 126 and listed that skill as “Maxed Out.”

The next version has an option for ExtendedLevels. If set to true, the max lvl is 126, otherwise the max lvl is 99 for all the people who like the regular levels.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Stats Grabber by Ron
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Looks good.

One thing though, why does it allow a level to go over 99? (E.g. in the picture Zezima’s 200mil xp in cooking shows up as level 126)?

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Stats Grabber by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I’m glad you like it SETO. For the amount of work I put into it, I was hoping there would be more responses. I guess the Other Scripts section isn’t what it used to be.

Updated to Beta 2. Now shows percentage complete.

item.title: RuneScape Stats Grabber by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

RuneScape Stats Grabber Beta 2 by Ron

Features:

  • Grabs all skills flawlessly
  • Uses Jagex’s highscore lite
  • Calculates Exp to Next Lvl
  • Form loads in less than a second
  • Easy to read stats with clCream and clSkyBlue backgrounds
  • Dynamically loads skills and games to the form
  • Calculates a skill’s level if you only have 1 unranked skill
  • Saves all usernames and uses a combobox to scroll through them
    • Delete usernames by clicking on them and hitting the Delete button

I rewrote the my entire script. I took a lot of functionality out because no one even used a lot of the features lol. If I ever have time the time, I will add more features. A copy of my To Do list is included in the forward comments.

~Ron

Read full topic
